titles.title: PARA–EMT Act of 2025
PARA–EMT Act of 2025
Preserve Access to Rapid Ambulance Emergency Medical Treatment Act of 2025
To preserve access to emergency medical services.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce, and in addition to the Committee on Education and Workforce, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

Referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce, and in addition to the Committee on Education and Workforce, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
